title: Lung Troubles
meta_content: A word from God was all Kate needed! Born with lungs to small and living out of breath all the time, one Sunday everything changed.
content:
I was born with lungs that were too small for my body. I always got winded easily and couldn't compete in heavy activities like sports. Sometimes I would have a hard time with normal breathing. Pastor Tom had a word about this, prayed for me, and I was totally healed. It was a miracle because my lungs are now normal. I thank God for every normal breath because I know He's the one who gave me new lungs. Kate
Reno, NV
